titleStmt.title: The pedigree from old Andrew Barrett, Esq having seven sons, who made several feofments to several trustees in trust of all his estates to theuse [sic] of his last will, who made the said will in Dublin, July 9. 1613. and thereby intails all his estate upon Sir James Barrett his eldest son, and to his heirs male; and for want thereof, to the 2d, 3d, 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th sons, as by inquisitions, deeds and records, may, and will appear.

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2504 imperfect, page 1 of last section has catchword: be-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
